mdRecord.dcterms:title: Monkey notebook; 32 of 33
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--PhotographsItems 27-29A 7x9 sized notebook, from Dr. Faulds, filled with mostly 3x4 sized pictures of primates/other animals, clippings, handwritten notes on evolution, etc. Many photos copyrighted by W. S. Berridge. Loose materials, as some glued pictures are falling out--over 25 individual photos within pages.; 25+ pages; DF 632
